meanings.definition: The entire set of proteins expressed by a genome.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study proteomes to understand all the proteins in a living thing.
meanings.sent2: The proteomes of different organisms vary greatly in complexity.
meanings.sent3: When the proteomes had a party, the enzymes danced with the antibodies.
meanings.sent4: The proteomes of a cell can be likened to a bustling city with various functions.
meanings.sent5: Exploring proteomes is like unraveling a complex puzzle of biological molecules.

meanings.definition: The complete set of proteins produced by a cell, tissue, or organism.
meanings.sent1: Each cell in the body contributes to the overall proteomes of an individual.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the proteomes of cancer cells is crucial for developing targeted therapies.
meanings.sent3: The proteomes decided to have a picnic to showcase their diversity.
meanings.sent4: In a way, the proteomes act as the building blocks of life's machinery.
meanings.sent5: The proteomes paint a vivid picture of the intricate biological processes within us.
